thothbot.parallax.core.client.renderers
Class WebGLRenderer

java.lang.Object
  thothbot.parallax.core.client.renderers.WebGLRenderer

public class WebGLRenderer
extends java.lang.Object

The WebGL renderer displays your beautifully crafted Scenes using WebGL, if your device supports it.

Constructor Summary

          The constructor will create renderer for the Canvas3d widget.

setViewport

public void setViewport(int x,
                        int y,
                        int width,
                        int height)
Sets the viewport to render from (X, Y) to (X + width, Y + height). By default X and Y = 0.

setScissor

public void setScissor(int x,
                       int y,
                       int width,
                       int height)
Sets the scissor area from (x, y) to (x + width, y + height).

enableScissorTest

public void enableScissorTest(boolean enable)
Enable the scissor test. When this is enabled, only the pixels within the defined scissor area will be affected by further renderer actions.

setMaxLights

public void setMaxLights(int maxLights)
Specifies how many total lights are allowed in the scene (divided evenly between point & directional lights) By default there are 4.

Parameters:
maxLights -

setClearColorHex

public void setClearColorHex(int hex)
Sets the the background color, using hex for the color.

Parameters:
hex - the clear color value.

setClearColorHex

public void setClearColorHex(int hex,
                             double alpha)
Sets the the background color, using hex for the color and alpha for the opacity.
Default clear clolor is 0x000000 - black.
Default clear alpha is 1.0 - opaque.

Parameters:
hex - the clear color value.
alpha - the opacity of the scene's background color, range 0.0 (invisible) to 1.0 (opaque).

setClearColor

public void setClearColor(Color color,
                          double alpha)
Sets the the background color, using Color for the color and alpha for the opacity.

Parameters:
color - the Color instance.
alpha - the opacity of the scene's background color, range 0.0 (invisible) to 1.0 (opaque).
See Also:
setClearColorHex(int, double).

getClearColor

public Color getClearColor()
Returns the background color.

Returns:
the Color instance.

getClearAlpha

public double getClearAlpha()
Returns the opacity of the scene's background color, range 0.0 (invisible) to 1.0 (opaque)

Returns:
the value in range <0,1>.

clear

public void clear(boolean color,
                  boolean depth,
                  boolean stencil)
Tells the renderer to clear its color, depth or stencil drawing buffer(s). If no parameters are passed, no buffer will be cleared.

Parameters:
color - is it should clear color
depth - is it should clear depth
stencil - is it should clear stencil
